Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
Writer: Wes Craven (character), William Kotzwinkle (story), Brian Helgeland (story), Brian Helgeland (screenplay), Jim Wheat (screenplay), Ken Wheat (screenplay)
Actors: John Beckman, Kisha Brackel, Brooke Bundy, Wanda Bursey
Plot: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.
